AD.name: URI
AD.description: The URI of the MongoDB server of the form 'mongodb://host:[port]'. Separate URIs with a comma (CSV) for a replica set.

AD.name: User
AD.description: The user id to use for authenticating to the MongoDB server. Leave blank if the server does not require authentication.

AD.name: Password
AD.description: The user password to use for authenticating to the MongoDB server. Leave blank if the server does not require authentication.
